game.name: Cursed Companions
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: If we say the wrong words... WE DIE! This game kills you with your own voices! Online co-op where everyone gets a forbidden word, say it and you kill your friends. Explore spooky dungeons, cast spells and defeat monsters with your voices.
